snippet.title: Freaked Fleapit - Exclusive Animated Character Trailer (ft. LilyPichu) | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Escape Purgatory with the help of a devilishly cute grim reaper in Freaked Fleapit, a musical indie game coming to Steam.

Styled as an anime dating sim, but featuring rhythm-based dungeon crawling, the upcoming indie game Freaked Fleapit tasks you with escaping the nine circles of hell by pairing up with a potential romantic partner. A true standout among anime indie games, be sure to check out Freaked Fleapit when it launches on Steam.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
